ingredients.content: 2 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves only, divided
½ tsp salt, plus extra to season
¼ tsp ground black pepper, plus extra to season
4 chicken thighs, boneless and skinless (approx. 6 oz ea.)

preparations.content: Place oil, flour, garlic, 1 sprig rosemary leaves, salt, pepper and turmeric into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and without measuring cup sauté <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add chicken stock, lemon juice and honey.  Insert simmering basket. Weigh in rice and rinse <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>.

Place a large piece of parchment (approx. 25 in.) into Varoma dish. Add lemon slices, 1 sprig rosemary leaves and chicken, season with salt and pepper. Fold parchment to close parcel and place seam side up into Varoma dish, tucking the folded ends underneath the parcel and arrange, ensuring some holes remain unobstructed to allow even distribution of steam. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 3<b>. Set Varoma aside, stir rice with spatula, return Varoma to position and cook a further <b>15-20 min/Varoma/speed 3<b> depending on size of chicken thighs.
Remove Varoma. Transfer steamed rice to a serving platter, and place cooked chicken on top. Pour sauce over chicken. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve hot.
